post.author: 최덕선
post.content:
제가 아는 에이전트로 부터 받은 이메일의 일부입니다. 관심있으시거나, 혹시 주변에 아시는 분 중에서 관심 있으신 분은 참조하시기 바랍니다.
In the meantime, I am looking for 2 AIX Unix Administrators. Who could you recommend? If you don't feel comfortable mentioning it to them, please give me their names and where they work and I will call them directly. It is for a really good company. Here is the job description. Have them contact me via email right away or they can call me at 416-863-0154 x263. Responsibilities
As a member of the UNIX Systems Administration team your responsibilities will include the following:
· Administration of 30+ UNIX servers (AIX); · System monitoring, troubleshooting and capacity management; · Provide hardware and operating system technical knowledge to other UNIX administrators, DBA's and systems developers; and · Participate in upgrades, tuning and development initiatives.
Must Have: · College or University degree in Computer Science or relevant experience; · Minimum of 6-9 years experience as a Unix Systems Administrator (preferably AIX); · Extensive Shell scripting experience; · Good Communications skills; · In-depth understanding of RS6000 hardware; · Self-directed team player with a strong drive to succeed and a high degree of enthusiasm and vision; and · On call pager support and some weekend work required. · Experience supporting and maintaining web servers · Extensive experience in HACMP environment
Good to Have: · Expert in apache/IHS and iPlanet/SunONE web server · Experience in WebSphere application server and J2EE applications · Experience in web application security and infrastructure · Exposure to: Application server: WebSphere 5.0.x/4.0.x/3.5.x; sapphire 7.x/5.x and Tomcat 4.x · Web Server: apache /2.0.x/1.3.x; IHS 2.0.x/1.3.x; iPlanet/SunONE 6.0/4.1.x/3.6.x · LDAP server: iPlanet LDAP server 5.x/4.12; IBM SecureWay Directory 5.1/4.1/3.2.2Reports to: Database and Systems Manager, Technical Services Thanking you in advance,
Joanne Boucher Manager, Keith Bagg I.T. Search
post.title: 2 AIX Unix Administrators
